title: Salton - What is induction cooking
transcripts: hi there ryan from Salton here to help you get comfortable with your new induction cooker which i'm sure you'll just love induction cooking has been used in restaurants and commercial kitchens for decades by professional chefs because it's extremely fast safe and energy-efficient thanks to salt and it's now available for domestic use so that you two can reap the benefits of this amazing technology why don't we check it out before we get started we've got to make sure that your cookware is induction compatible but Ryan how do i know of michael kors induction compatible that's easy take any man you've got lying around at home in this case I've got one right off the fridge and stick it to the bottom of your pot or pan if it sticks and stays then you know that you're good to go if not you've got to find some magnetic cookware which means its induction compatible induction cooking is the safest method of cooking it's safer than gas ceramic and coil elements as well as infrared that's because even when set to maximum the cooktop stays cool to the touch so I've been boiling water and an induction compatible pot and take a look at this that twenty-dollar bill has been there the entire time and it's not burnt or singed I'd like to see any other method of cooking do that safe fast efficient and extremely precise is for those reasons that induction cooking has been used by chefs the world over for 30 years and i'm sure you'll absolutely love it
